profile.name: Amitabh Sahu
profile.title: Web Developer
profile.about: Hi, I'm Amitabh Sahu. I enjoy creating end-to-end products, focusing on developing intuitive experiences that continuously improve based on metrics.

experience.title: Software Developer - SocialBoat
experience.desc: Collaborated with fellow developers to create a user-friendly web app and a hybrid mobile app, integrated GPT, and implemented progress tracking.
experience.stack: TypeScript • NextJS • React Native • Tailwind • Firebase

projects.title: React List - React UI Package
projects.desc: Build and maintain a React package of a scrollable interface to render infinite lists with type support, including horizontal, inverted, and section options.

projects.title: EditTube - Streamline YouTube Workflow
projects.desc: Teamed up with developers for a hackathon to create an app that solves YouTube's problem of downloading videos for upload by providing a view and upload option within the platform.

projects.title: Paper Note - Note Taking App
projects.desc: Developed a simple note-taking app as a progressive web app to enable users to take notes efficiently both online and offline.

projects.title: Socialize - Social Media App
projects.desc: Create a social media application with basic CRUD functionality using REST API.
